name: Teredor
storyline:
The gods have created Teredor: Explore, create and fight as a player in an imaginative world full of adventure and a certain humour. Compete alone or with an entire guild against the dangers of the World. Fight great and epic battles or enjoy the peace and quiet in a lovingly designed environment and find the Easter Eggs.

By the way: The story is you - in the truest sense of the word. Shape the world with the developers, build Teredor and give the items their own names, create entire quest series and let the community participate or have your very own armour created!
summary: Indie open-world MMORPG. Experience a world full of unsolved mysteries in a lovingly designed, handpainted setting. And the best thing about it: You have the chance to actively influence the whole game. You can add Quests, Items, Names and more! You are the Game!
